cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
project(imgui)

add_library(imgui)
target_sources(imgui PRIVATE 
	src/imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp
	src/imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
	src/imgui.cpp
	src/imgui_draw.cpp
	src/imgui_tables.cpp
	src/imgui_widgets.cpp
	src/imgui_demo.cpp
)
target_include_directories(imgui PUBLIC include)
target_link_libraries(imgui
    PUBLIC        # or PRIVATE, if you don't want transitive linkage
        glfw      # the GLFW target defined by add_subdirectory(thirdparty/GLFW)
        glad      # the glad    target defined by add_subdirectory(thirdparty/glad)
)
